A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: With ample opportunity for interesting twists and turns\, 'The Last Jedi' went the wrong direction\, or just floundered\, at nearly every opportunity. Some good scenes\, some ok performances\, but nothing special. If it wasn't for the critics overhyping this movie\, the reaction may have been better. And no\, you never burn all the ancient wisdom because a single feisty girl maybe knows some stuff. Anti wisdom from a formerly wise character; no thanks.
